tool.name: Plot Variables
tool.description: provides variable representation for RCC, PLS and PCA analysis
tool.help:
=========== Description ===========
----------- Usage ----------- Input result (Rdata) a result object from a MixOmics function e.g. PCA, PLS, IPCA, CCA, Multilevel.
X-axis dimension index of the component to show on the x-axis, e.g. if a PCA function was ran with ncomp=3, you can choose 1, 2, or 3 to plot on the x-axis.
Y-axis dimension index of the component to show on the y-axis, e.g. if a PCA function was ran with ncomp=3, you can choose 1, 2, or 3 to plot on the y-axis.
Show Variable names select this to plot using the variables names instead of circles.
